198521.「……はじめまして <pc>さん。\n 私の名は パッキュレ。\n 見てのとおり:
...Pleased to meet you, <pc>.
My name is Pakkule. As you can see, I am
but a humble priest.

198522.「人目につかぬよう 密かに記した\n 私のメッセージに たやすく 気づくとは。\:
I am quite amazed that you were able to notice
my extremely-well-hidden message. You have
frighteningly remarkable observation skills.

198523.「それゆえか 我が友人であるパクレは\n あなたのことを 危険人物と判断して\n:
Perhaps because of that, my friend Pakul had
assumed you were dangerous, and intended
to eliminate you.

198524.「ですが 私の考えは 異なります。\n あなたほどのチカラの持ち主ならば\n ぜ:
But I do not agree. I believe that an
individual as skilled as you should, by
all means, join our forces.

198525.「そこで あなたのことを試したく\n 依頼を果たしてもらいたい……というわけです:
So, that is why I would like to test you...by
having you complete this request.

198526.「あれれー？ あんた\n パクレのオヤジじゃないのー？: Huhhh? Aren't you that Pakul fella?

198527.「最近 店に来ないと思ったら\n 神父に 転職しちゃってたみたいな？\n ぜんぜ:
I haven't seen you come around lately, but I
guess you're a priest now? Doesn't suit you
at all, honeyーit's just hilarious!

198528.「なんですか あなたは。\n 私は パッキュレ神父と 申す者。\n 断じて パク:
What are you talking about? I am Father
Pakkule. I am certainly not Inspector Pakul...

198529.「あはははーっ。\n なに そのしゃべり？\n パクレのくせに ナマイキだぞー。:
Ahahaha... Why are you talkin' like that?
Pakul, you're so full of yourself!

198530.「なになに？ この神父さんって\n 本当は パクレ警部なの！？:
What did you say? Is this priest really
Inspector Pakul?!

198531.「あっ もしかして 変装しての捜査中？\n うわあ すっごいや！！:
Ah, I guess you're just doing one of your
investigations in disguise, then? Wow!
You're so amazing!!

198532.「ええー 変装なのー？\n こんな ヘタクソな変装ってアリ？:
Huh? A disguise? Really?
You call THAT a disguise?

198533.「……ええいっ！\n 私は パッキュレ神父なのだっ。\n パクレ警部では ないっ:
Y...yes! I am Father Pakkule.
I am NOT Inspector Pakul!!

198534.「お前たちなど 知らん！\n とっとと ここから 立ち去れーっ！！:
I don't know you people! Get out of my
sight!!

198536.「ほらほら ぼうや！\n お姉さんと いっしょに\n こわいオジサンから 逃げま:
Come on, little man! Let's get away from this
oh-so-scary man!

198537.「……えっ えっ？\n ちょっと 待ってよ。\n ボクは パクレ警部と もっと…:
...H-hey, wait a sec. I still want to talk
with Inspector Pakul a little more...

198538.「ふう……。\n 思わぬ邪魔が 入ってしまいましたが\n 話の続きと まいりまし:
Ahem... I apologize for such an unexpected
interruption. Now then, where was I...

198539.「ドルワーム王国にて 発生している\n とある事件の 調査と解決……。\n それ:
Your task is to investigate and solve an
incident that's been ongoing in Dolworm
Kingdom...

198540.「城下町の民家に マクリマという女性が\n 住んでいるのですが その夫 バァツェ:
In town lives a woman named Makurima. Her
husband, Bahtze, changed suddenly. It's
like he's a completely different person.

198541.「何者かがバァツェ氏と 入れ替わっているのか\n はたまた 新たな人格が 芽生え:
Whether someone has swapped places with him
or if a new personality has emerged...remains
to be seen.

198542.「いずれにしても このまま 放置しておけば\n 彼と その家族だけの問題では 収:
Regardless... If left unattended, this will not
be just a problem for him and his family, but
it may endanger the entire world.

198543.「至急 ドルワーム王国へ向かい\n マクリマさんのもとを 訪れてください。:
Please head to Dolworm Kingdom as soon as you
can, and meet with Ms. Makurima.

198544.「この依頼を果たせれば 我が友人パクレも\n あなたの処遇を 考え直すことでしょ:
If you are able to fulfill this request, then
Pakul will surely reconsider your position.
If you value your life, I'd get to it.

198545.「今後 私から 連絡があるときは\n この木箱に 記すことにします。\n 調査に:
I will use this crate if I need to contact
you. If you find yourself lost and unsure
what to do, be sure to check it.

198546.「では 私は これにて……。: Then I shall leave you to it.

198547.「……武器の数に 異常なし。\n 品質チェックなんか やってられるか……。:
Weapon counts look normal...
No time for a quality check, though...

198550.「あいつも オレに 会いたいはずだ……。: I'm sure they're just dying to see me...

198551.「……なんだ あんたは。\n ここは 立ち入り禁止だぞ。\n 今すぐに 出ていっ:
...Hey, what are you doing?
You're not allowed in here. I'll have
to ask you to leave...

198552.「はやく 砂漠のオアシスに 行かなきゃ。\n あいつに いやしてもらうんだ……。:
I gotta get to the oasis in the desert, and
fast. I need them to heal me...

198553.「おやおや……。ここに来て\n 捜査が行きづまった……という感じですかな。:
Well, well... It appears that your
investigation has come to a bit of a
standstill, I see...

198554.「……なるほど。たとえ あなたでも\n これを 外から 開けることは\n むずか:
...I see. Even for someone of your caliber, I
have to admit that opening this from the
outside would be quite difficult.

198555.「いたしかた ありません。\n ここは 特別に 私の知恵をお貸ししましょう。:
There's nothing I'm able to do here.
Allow me to impart you with some of my
wisdom.

198556.「外にいる者に 開けられない扉……\n それを開けるには どうすれば よいのか？:
How does one open a door that cannot be opened
from the outside...?

198557.「答えは ひとつしか ありません。\n 中にいる者に 開けてもらえば よいのです:
There is only a single answer.
Let those who are already inside open it.

198558.「……ふむ。アレで いきましょう。\n あなたは 次の材料を 集めてください。:
...Yes. Let's proceed with that plan.
I'll need you to gather some more
materials.

198559.「まずは ここより北 デマトード高地などにいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
The first step is to find a Smoky Ball, which
you can find from Tyrannoceratops to the areas
north of here, such as the Dematode Highlands.

198560.「それと ようせいのひだねをひとつ。\n これは 鍛冶系の職人ギルドや\n 各町:
You'll need a Lamplight as well. You can find
them at one of the smithing guilds, or at a
material store in town.

198561.「そのふたつの材料が あれば\n 煙を大量に発生させる 発煙筒を\n 作ることが:
With these two materials, you'll be able to
put together a smoke bomb that will
release tons of smoke.

198562.「……もう おわかりですね。\n 大量の煙を この扉のスキマから 送り込み\n:
...You understand, yes? Lots of smoke will
pass through the cracks of this door and
flush out whomever is inside.

198563.「発煙筒の作り方も お教えしておきましょう。\n 材料さえあれば 簡単なものです:
I will also show you how to make one. It's
quite simple as long as you have the materials
needed.

198564.<pc>は パッキュレ神父に\n発煙筒の作り方を 教えてもらった！:
Father Pakkule teaches <pc> how
to create a smoke bomb!

198565.デマトード高地などで <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を倒し\nケムケム玉を手に:
After obtaining a Smoky Ball from a
Tyrannoceratops, be sure to come back here
with a Lamplight as well!

198566.「あとは あなたの手で おやりなさい。\n 忘れているかも しれませんが\n こ:
I leave the rest to you. In case you have
forgotten, this is all part of your trial.

198567.「では 私は これにて……。: Then I shall leave you to it.

198569.バァツェが いっしょにいたのは\nこのケダモンのようだ。:
It appears that the person Bahtze was with was
actually a Feralbeast!

198570.しかし 明らかに ゴブル砂漠東にいる\n普通のケダモンとは 様子が 異なっている:
But it's clearly different from the normal
Feralbeasts that wander around the eastern
Goble Desert...

198577.「おやおや。様子を見にきてみれば\n やっかいなモノが こちらに来ていましたな。:
Well, well. I came to check how things were,
and something troublesome seems to have
made its way here.

198578.「そやつには そんじょそこらの攻撃では\n 致命傷を与えることは できないのです:
You won't be able to defeat it with just
normal attacks.

198579.「……ふむ。この姿では\n すこしばかり 格好が つきませんかな。:
Hmmm... I look quite uncouth dressed like
this, don't I?

198580.「おどろいたかね？\n パッキュレ神父は 世を忍ぶ 仮の姿。\n その正体は ワ:
Surprised? Father Pakkule was merely a
guise to blend in. A disguise of my own
making, if you will.

198581.「キミを 試したくてね。\n このような趣向を 用意させてもらった。:
I wished to test you, so that is why I had
prepared this little plan.

198585.「あんたたちが ケダ子を いじめたのか……。: What have you done to Beastie...?

198586.「ケダ子は かわいそうなヤツなんだぞ。\n なのに なんで こんなことを……。:
Beastie here is helpless! Why are you doing
this to him?

198587.「許さないぞ あんたたち！！: I'm not gonna let you get away with this!!

198588.「ダーリン これは どういうこと！？: And just WHAT is this all about, darling?!

198589.「この おぞましい魔物は なんなの？\n こんな毛玉みたいのが いいって言うの？:
Just what is this horrifying monster?
You want to stay with this hairball? Don't
you love me anymore!?

198591.「わーっ 待ってくれ！\n そんなんじゃ ないんだ！！: H..hey, wait! It's not like that!!

198592.「オレが 愛しているのは お前だけだ！\n だが こいつは かわいそうなヤツなん:
You are the one that I love!
But I can't help but feeling sorry for this
poor little guy!

198593.「こいつとは 砂漠で会った……。\n 他のケダモンに おそわれていたんだ。:
I came across him in the desert...
He was being terrorized by other
Feralbeasts!

198594.「見た目が こんなだからだろう。\n きっと 仲間はずれに されちまったんだな。:
It's probably because of the way he looks...
I'm sure that's why he was left out.

198595.「ひどいケガをしていたから 助けて\n それからずっと ここで 面倒を見てたんだ:
He was hurt bad, so I helped him.
I've been taking care of him here ever since.

198596.「お前は 毛むくじゃらの魔物が いると\n クシャミが 止まらないだろう？\n:
You sneeze like crazy when there's a hairy
monster nearby, right? That's why I
couldn't tell you about this...

198597.「このところ お前のことを\n ないがしろにしてしまったのは 悪かった。\n オ:
I'm sorry that I've been neglecting you
lately. Can you ever forgive me...?

198599.「いいの。もう ぜーんぶ ゆるしちゃうっ！！: It's fine. I totally forgive you!

198601.「だが オレは結局 こいつを守れなかった……。: But I couldn't protect him after all.

198603.「ケダ子…… 死んじまったとばかり…………。: Kedako... I thought you were dead...

198604.「キズが ぜんぶ 治ってるぞ。\n どういうことだ……？:
All the scratches are healed. What's going
on...?

198605.「そうか……。あんたたちは\n こいつを 退治しに来たんじゃなかったのか。:
I see... I thought you guys came here to
exterminate this guy.

198608.「……ここまでだ。\n 追うのは やめておきたまえ。\n もう アレに関わらぬの:
That's it. Stop chasing it. It's better for
you if you don't get involved with that thing
anymore.

198609.「そう……。キミは 夢を見ていたのだよ。\n 真に 守らなければならぬ者のもとへ:
Yes... you were dreaming. Go back to those you
truly must protect.

198610.「……ああ そのとおりだ。\n あんたたちにも 迷惑をかけてしまったな。:
Yeah, that's right. I'm sorry I put you guys
through that too.

198613.「事件は 解決といったところか。\n ご苦労だったな <cs_pchero>君。:
I guess the case is closed. Thanks for your
efforts <cs_pchero>.

198614.「……ワガハイは もうひと任務あるので\n これで 失礼しよう。:
...I have one more assignment, so I'll leave
you now.

198615.「ああ。キミは この後 オルフェアの裏通りの\n 例の木箱を 確認したまえ。:
Yeah. You should check the crate in the
alleyway behind Orphea after this.
